0.0.3.name: wordpress/grain
0.0.3.description: This is a free wordpress theme. It is microformats enabled. It features custom menu, custom background, custom header, multiple colour schemes, mutliple layouts, your feedburner url can be given and custom stylesheet for easy customization. It also features a custom stylesheet for easy personalization. This theme is xhtml 1.0 transitional and css 3.0 validated.
